content: photo on page 9 as you go along to make sure the stitch placements look right 6 double_crochet in marked chain space 1 fpsc around marked stitch 2 6 double_crochet in same chain space 1 chain-1 single_crochet in marked stitch 3 chain-1 6 double_crochet in marked chain space 4 fpsc around marked stitch 5 6 double_crochet in same chain space 4 chain-1 single_crochet in marked stitch 6 chain-1 repeat from beginning all around reattach stitch markers if you think you need to close the round invisibly or with a slip_stitch thread the ends through to the wrong side and weave them in © christine bateman 2023 catswhiskerscrochet@gmail com
